raw_comment: I noticed that among the older generations there is a mindset of that the world is the way it is and any hope for it becoming better is slim. Whereas the younger population have this idea that they could make the world a better place and that it's not a far fetched idea. I wonder why there is this difference between the older and younger people of the world. It relates to us or at least me because I am a part of the younger population and have a full life ahead of me and so the chance is that I think that there is a while for me and my generation to truly make a difference in our world. A catchy headline would be, "Hope or Nope".
ace_sentences: I noticed a mindset among older generations.
Many older people think that the world is the way it is.
Many older people think that the hope that the world becomes better is slim.
I noticed a mindset among younger people.
Many younger people think that they can make the world a better place.
Many younger people think that this idea is not far-fetched.
I wonder why this difference exists between older people and younger people.
I am a part of the younger population.
I have a full life ahead of me.
I think that my generation has time to make a difference in the world.
The headline is: Hope or Nope.
